alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Windham, southern Tolland and east central Hartford Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coventry, or near Vernon, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Manchester, Glastonbury, Vernon, Mansfield, Windham, Plainfield, Willimantic, Killingly, Tolland, Coventry, Hebron, Brooklyn, Columbia, Canterbury, Bolton, Pomfret, Sterling, Andover, Chaplin and Hampton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
